page.title: 02FILKINS: POPULATION
page.content: 1981 Census:includes Broughton Poggs Resident population: 381 (192 females, 189 males) Nearly 50% single,widowed or divorced; the remainder are married. AGE: Under 16: 78 - 20% 16-60: 208 - 50% Over 60: 95 - 30% ECONOMICALLY ACTIVE: (over 16) - 171 155 working, 13 seeking work, 3 sick ECONOMICLY INACTIVE: (over 16) - 131 12 students, 7 chronic sick, 38 retired 145 HOUSEHOLDS, all private. Most have 4-8 rooms, with bath, inside lavatory & telephone. 3 houses have no bath. 52 owner-occupied houses 38 council houses, 3 with 1 bedroom 1 house rented with business 26 rented houses - unfurnished 10 rented houses - furnished 18 tied houses; 1 non-permanent house
